hydroapi package¶

Submodules¶

hydroapi.api module¶

hydroapi.api.fetch_hydrometers()¶

Return all saved hydrometers, Add a new hydrometer by color

hydroapi.api.fetch_profiles()¶

Return all saved profiles, Add a new profile by name

hydroapi.api.hydrometer(id)¶

Return associated hydrometer data by id, Update hydrometer info

hydroapi.api.hydrometer_info(id)¶

Return associated hydrometer info by id,

hydroapi.api.hydrometer_key(id, key)¶

Return the specified hydrometer value by key

hydroapi.api.hydrometer_last(id)¶

Return the last data entry from the hydrometer

hydroapi.api.hydrometer_mac(mac_addr)¶

Return associated hydrometer data by mac address, used by the bluetooth connection manager

hydroapi.api.profile(id)¶

Return all of a profile’s information by id, Update a profile

hydroapi.api.reading(id)¶

Insert a new data row for a sensor reading

hydroapi.application module¶

hydroapi.application.create_app(app_name='HYDRO_API')¶
